::Feline::

She cried out in pain as she gets hit again.  Her woulds were getting 
to her.  Her beautiful female torso was now riddled with holes from 
the shots, her shoulders were shot up and her legs were leaking as 
bad as the rest of her.  She was starting to feel weak from the loss 
of mech fluid.  She fired her optic lazars at twice at Beholder, and 
fires twice at Gigas.  

She stumbled and fell to the ground.  She growled and got back up.  
She was in a lot of pain, but was to mad to stop.  She kept firing, 
not giving up untill she was dead.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> 
> > ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Havoc/Repressor::
> >
> > Zardus tries to dodge, one of the shots hitting him in the chest 
and
> leaving
> > a large dent. He growls. He was not going to let another shot 
like that
> hit
> > him.
> >
> > Zardus looks down at Grenade, Zardus fires two dozen more shots.
> 
> OOC: How high up is Zardus?
> 
> BIC: Grenade was paying attention to Feline and was hit in the back 
with
> every shot. He made a whining squeal like metal scraping together. 
He looked
> up to see Zardus. He fired up at Zardus with a missile.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Havoc laughs as he sees Beholder fall, another bomb emerging out 
of the
> > WarMachine and flying at Beholder.
> 
> Beholder also is looking at Feline, who wouldn't want to kill her? 
Beholder
> walks out from the way the bomb was falling, the explosion going up 
his back
> and leaving him looking up in the air in shock.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > A missile explodes against the bottom of Repressor, sending him 
spiralling
> > before he recovers.
> >
> > He turns in the air, his weapons getting a lock on Gigas and Horn 
Drill
> again.
> 
> Horn Drill actually managed to get away from the shots, but in the 
process,
> he let Gigas be hit. Gigas doesn't notice and fires at Feline twice.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
